subject: Photography
title: Color Trends in Modern Photography
description: A quick win: understand Color Trends in Modern Photography.

hook.text: Orange and teal dominated the 2010s. Desaturated film looks owned the 2020s. Color trends are cyclical.

buildup.text: Social media amplifies trends. One viral editing style spawns millions of copies within weeks.

discovery.text: Trends reflect cultural moods. Warm nostalgic palettes emerge during uncertain times. Clean minimal tones suit optimism.

twist.text: Following trends guarantees your work looks dated in five years. The timeless images transcend fashionable palettes.

climax.text: Learn trends to understand them. Then decide: follow, adapt, or deliberately reject them.

punchline.text: Trends fade. Good color sense endures.

quiz.question: Why might following color trends be risky for photographers?
options: Trendy styles guarantee the work looks dated within a few years
